reviewText: There's nothing there. Not a class at all really, an empty promise. My opinion. - Stagehand Jim

For a few months I've been interested in developing skills as a storyteller. Besides being something I love to do, the skills come in handy in every aspect of my life.

Jay is a storyteller I respect and he does a very nice intro on this DVD. I knocked off one star ONLY because, for the price, I want it to be about twice as long. I have watched it several times and will again, from time to time... but I want more. I'll have to attend one of his workshops, I guess.
